mapper.insert: INSERT INTO VOICE_ANALYSIS (VOICE_ANALYSIS_SQ, VOICE_DECIBEL, VOICE_RANGE, ANS_SQ) VALUES (VOICE_ANALYSIS_SQ.NEXTVAL, NVL(#{voiceDecibel},0), NVL(#{voiceRange},0), #{ansSq})
mapper.select: SELECT INTERVIEW_SQ, VOICE_DECIBEL, VOICE_RANGE FROM INTERVIEW A, QUESTION B, ANSWER C, (SELECT ROUND(SUM(VOICE_DECIBEL)/COUNT(*)), ROUND(SUM(VOICE_RANGE)/COUNT(*)), ANS_SQ FROM VOICE_ANALYSIS GROUP BY ANS_SQ) D WHERE A.INTERVIEW_SQ = B.INTERVIEW_SQ AND B.QUEST_SQ = C.QUEST_SQ AND C.ANSWER_SQ = D.ANSWER_sQ AND ROWNUM < 6 GROUP BY A.INTERVIEW_SQ ORDER BY A.INTERVIEW_SQ DESC
